content.title: Pulmonary Artery Sling
content.description: Anomalous left pulmonary artery arising from right pulmonary artery, passing between trachea and esophagus.

anatomy.anomaly: LPA from RPA, courses behind trachea

treatment.tracheal_repair: May require tracheal reconstruction if stenotic

content.clinical_pearl: Always evaluate for tracheal stenosis (complete cartilage rings) - may require simultaneous repair
